title: Facade Team Lead
jobDescription:
Relocation assistance will be provided.

Share your resume and Portfolio here or Ankit@recruitingguy.com



Position: Facade Team Lead

Location: Navi Mumbai, India
Relocation Assistance: Provided

A Confidential Company in the aluminum faade industry is seeking an experienced and talented Design Team Leader for our Mumbai location. This role involves leading our project design teams in delivering external aluminum faade packages for architecturally sophisticated buildings throughout the UK and Ireland. The successful applicant will report to the Design Manager and work closely with the pre-construction, commercial, and operational teams throughout the design, production, and installation stages of each project. This position requires alignment with the UK time zone and operates on a 5-day work week, Monday to Friday.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead Design Teams: Guide and manage design teams in delivering external aluminum faade packages.
  • Architectural Interpretation: Interpret architectural requirements for the design, fabrication, and installation of aluminum building facades, roof lights, and fenestration.
  • Compliance: Ensure all designs comply with manufacturer recommendations, company procedures, client requirements, and current legislation.
  • Budget Monitoring: Monitor project budgets and ensure adherence to design and QA procedures.
  • Team Direction: Provide direction and support to internal and external design teams, monitor design progress, and report potential issues.
  • Department Liaison: Liaise regularly with Purchasing, Estimating, Commercial, and Operations departments.
  • Project Handover: Attend handover meetings to discuss projects, identify design areas needing attention, and clarify the scope of works.
  • Documentation Discrepancies: Proactively address discrepancies in project documentation/specification and arrange necessary meetings.
  • Drawing Production: Oversee the production of working drawings/designs, ensuring they align with customer specifications and amendments.
  • Cost Management: Ensure drawings meet cost budgets and clearly define methods of construction, setting out, and materials used.
  • Calculation Production: Produce calculations to meet manufacturer delivery dates and work within the company CDM procedure.
  • Client Liaison: Liaise with client representatives to agree on variations between customer specifications/drawings and tender documents.
  • Schedule Production: Lead the timely production of aluminum flashing schedules, procurement schedules, and cutting lists.
  • Review Paperwork: Review procurement, flashing schedules, and all manufacturing paperwork for the design team.
  • Drawing Issuance: Supervise and monitor the issuance of drawings and design information, ensuring adherence to relevant processes and procedures.
  • Record Keeping: Keep daily records of contracts for weekly timesheets.
  • Manual Production: Lead the production of operation and maintenance manuals.
  • Team Support: Provide support to the Design Manager and team members.

Requirements:

  • Experience: 15+ years of experience in aluminum faade design and team leadership.
  • Architectural Knowledge: Strong understanding of architectural requirements for aluminum facades, roof lights, and fenestration.
  • Leadership Skills: Proven experience in leading design teams and managing project design stages.
  • Liaison Skills: Ability to liaise with various departments and manage client relationships effectively.
  • Organizational Skills: Excellent organizational and communication skills.
  • Language Proficiency: Proficiency in English is required as the business home office is in the UK.
  • Relocation: Willingness to relocate to Mumbai, with relocation assistance provided.
  • Time Zone Alignment: Availability to work aligned with the UK time zone.
  • Work Week Commitment: Commitment to a 5-day work week, Monday to Friday.

Application Requirements:

  • CV and Portfolio: Submit a CV and portfolio showcasing relevant experience and projects.
  • Relocation Willingness: Successful applicants must be willing to relocate to Mumbai.
  • Relocation Assistance: Relocation assistance will be provided.

title: Senior UI/UX Designer
jobDescription:
-Create wireframes and prototypes to communicate your ideas effectively.
- Create visual designs and user interfaces for the wireframes.
- Work in some capacity (executing, mentoring or leading) on at least 2 projects in parallel.
- Communicate with the client to understand the project requirements and scope.
- Present and rationalise your design decisions and stick to well-known design guidelines while designing interfaces.
- Collaborate with team members across verticals (development, graphic design and content) to bring the product youre working on to life.
- Train (around best practices for designs) and manage junior designers.
- Continually keep yourself and your design team updated with the latest changes in your industrys standards.


Requirements
- Have designed user interfaces for mobile and web platforms in the past.
- 2-3+ years of experience in the UI / UX field.
- Familiar with UX methodologies research, interviews, personas, competitor research, sitemap, wireframing, responsive design and prototyping.
- Familiar with UI principles and being able to translate a given user-experience journey into a visually great and intuitive UI.
- Experience building and utilising design systems.
- Experience using Figma.
- Being able to communicate effectively with clients and stakeholders about your teams design decisions choices.
- Being willing to mentor junior designers on your team, helping them grow and providing constructive feedback.
- Strong critical thinking and analytical skills.
- Proactive in proposing ideas and ensuring the design standards across the projects are maintained.
- Proficient (written and verbal) in the English language.
- Brownie points if you know prototyping /motion design tools like After Effects, ProtoPie, etc.
- Someone who is keen and eager to learn, put forth ideas and loves the design as much as we do.

title: Windows Server Management
jobDescription:
We are looking for a passionate individual, having 4 - 8 years of work experience and expertise in Active directory, ADFS, Group policy management, VMWare administration, Microsoft Service center (SCCM, SCOM etc), Azure AD Skills, Quest active role skills.

Perk- 1 month onsite training in London

Technical Skills: L2 protocols, Network Infrastructure, Windows Server, Linux server, DNS, TCPIP, SMTP Email Server configuration, load balancer, Active directory, ADFS, Group policy management, VMWare administration, Microsoft Service center (SCCM, SCOM etc), Azure AD Skills, Quest active role skills, Hitachi UCP CI troubleshooting, DELL Isilon Administration.

Roles and Responsibilities
  • Must to accept rotational shifts.
  • MCSE, CCNA, or similar certifications desirable.
  • Microsoft Windows Server & AD (Active Directory) troubleshoot, maintain and administer.
  • Microsoft System Center (SCCM, SCOM etc) maintain and administer
  • VMware, Hitachi UCP CI, DELL Isilon troubleshooting and administration
  • Managing the DR environments and taking part in DR test exercises
  • Adherence to ISO 9001:2008, ISO 27001 and Policies & Procedures
  • Ability to demonstrate experience of AD (Active Directory, ADFS, Group Policy management, etc.)
  • Ability to demonstrate experience of VMware administration
  • Ability to demonstrate Microsoft System Center (SCCM, SCOM etc.) Administration
  • Proven experience troubleshooting security issues across various technologies
  • Azure AD and Quest Active Roles skills
  • Customer-centric career experience and excellent Time management skills.
  • Ability to work within customer focused team
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Take ownership of customer issues reported and see problems through to resolution.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues through sharing best practices and direct resolution.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication and effective organizational and multi-tasking skills. Proven ability to quickly learn new technical domains and train others.
  • Should be flexible to work in an operational environment, rotational shifts and on-call schedule.
  • Other general responsibilities as instructed by management.
